slot.description: Entry index in the bundle. first entry is at slot=`0`

enum-description.jpg: JPEG compression. no mipmaps. Please note that alpha channel may have been added after the JPEG stream. This alpha channel is alwasy 8bit and zlib compressed. Last 4 byte of the entire stream are the 32 bit offset to the beginning of the alpha stream (little-endian)
enum-description.dds: The DDS header will specify the type of compression and number of mipmaps. **WARNING** only DXT1 (no alpha) and DXT5 (alpha channel) are supported
enum-description.ktx: Kronos group container for ETC2 compressed texture. Mipmap may be available

format.description: Texture format. *Note*: nested bundles are **not** supported
